rooms.description: Spacious living area designed to foster a welcoming atmosphere, adhering to Vastu principles by orienting the entrance towards the east. Minimalist decor with natural light through large windows.
Main bedroom featuring north or northwest direction for positive energy. Includes built-in storage and a private balcony overlooking the garden, in line with Vastu guidelines for relaxation.
Functional kitchen designed with west-facing window to enhance culinary experiences, equipped with modern appliances and sufficient counter space. Layout follows safe food preparation principles.
Efficient bathroom layout with north-east facing water sources, incorporating Vastu practices for hygiene and serenity.
Intimate dining space adjacent to the kitchen. Placed in a southeast direction for social interactions as per Vastu norms.
Dedicated library area with north-east orientation, ample shelving and seating designed to promote knowledge and creativity according to Vastu guidelines.

Ergonomically designed home office space oriented towards the east or northeast for productivity. Equipped with natural light, sound insulation, and a dedicated workstation area, adhering to industrial design aesthetics.

openings.description: Main entrance designed with Vastu principles ensuring wealth and positive energy flow into the home.
Large windows in living room and bedroom to enhance natural light and air circulation, promoting a healthy indoor environment.
Strategically placed vents and skylights ensuring optimum ventilation and energy efficiency.
